dcterms:creator: M. Hassan
V. Choutas
D. Tzionas
M. J. Black
dcterms:description: PRO-teXt is an extension of PROXD and PROXE, integrating text prompts into human motion interactions for scene synthesis, with a total of 200 interactions.
dcterms:title: PRO-teXt

dcterms:creator: K. Wang
Y.-A. Lin
B. Weissmann
M. Savva
A. X. Chang
D. Ritchie
dcterms:description: HUMANISE is a large-scale dataset that aligns human motions with scenes, providing text prompts that describe spatial relations between target objects and scene entities.
dcterms:title: HUMANISE
